about_the_game:
Desperate to see more from your favourite girl in the peaceful town of Series Shores? Is Freya your girl, or maybe it's Alma? Perhaps it's not the replicas your after and it's the XIao's who've stolen your heart? Either way Volunteer, Dr Alleyne has you covered in this 4K render package!

The Anna Series render package volume 1 is now live for everyone on steam! Great news, best news, as Aiko would say. Guess that isn't the best news... The best news is the volume will keep on growing! Great news, best ne- You get it.

Anna: The Series Test 4K renders volume 1 currently contains 200+ wallpapers and once phase 4 releases it will updated with all the weekly extra renders which have come out since the volumes release and then. No need to pay any extra. Meaning it doesn't matter who your favourite is because everyone is included! Some of these renders are Adult/NSFW themed, while others are more acceptable with your family. So once again, either way, Alleyne has your back, Volunteer!

Indclude are:
  • Aiko Sasaki - 37 Renders
  • Kiyomi Sasaki - 28 Renders
  • Alma Way - 18 Renders
  • Freya Valentina - 47 Renders
  • Cherry Valentina - 69 Renders (Nice)
  • Aer-dula Xiao - 50 Renders
  • Alei-yin Xiao - 36 Renders
  • Aer Replica - 13 Renders
  • True Aiko - 13 Renders
  • True Kiyomi - 10 Renders
  • True Alma - 16 Renders
  • True Freya - 8 Renders
  • True Cherry - 7 Renders

Not much else to say here.... Enjoy the wallpapers and the woman of Series Shores in their full delight! You'll find these renders in your steam directory / AnnaSeries/4k renders

content_descriptors.notes: Renders include nudity and show sexual acts.
